pages.title: The Betweenlands
pages.text: This large and expansive mod adds a whole new hostile dimension to Minecraft along with its own blocks, mobs, items and even music. $(br2)$(l:https://the-betweenlands.fandom.com/wiki/The_Betweenlands_Wiki)The Betweenlands Wiki$(/l)

pages.title: How to get there
pages.text: To get to The Betweenlands dimension, you need to acquire a swamp talisman.$(br)In order to do this, you must find a druid circle located in a swamp biome and collect 4 unique talisman pieces and use the altar there to combine them.$(br)Once this is done, find a large space and use the talisman on any sapling to create a portal.
